Reference

Traffic

Functions for metrics and data related to traffic

wx_project_views()

Project page-view counts

wx_page_views()

Page view counts

wx_top_viewed_pages()

Top viewed pages

wx_unique_devices()

Unique device counts

Users

Functions for metrics and data related to users

wx_active_editors()

Active editors counts

wx_top_editors()

Top editors by edit count

wx_newly_registered_users()

Newly registered users counts

Content

Functions for metrics and data related to content

Edits

wx_project_edits()

Project edit counts

wx_page_edits()

Page edit counts

Pages

wx_new_pages()

New pages counts

wx_total_pages()

Total pages counts

wx_edited_pages()

Edited pages counts

wx_top_edited_pages()

Top edited pages (by edits)

Mediarequests

Data on the use of media files across wikis

wx_mediareqs_referer()

Mediarequest counts per referer

wx_mediareqs_file()

Mediarequest counts for a media file

wx_most_requested_files()

Most requested files for a referer

Utilities

Utility functions primarily for internal use

wx_query_api()

Generate a rate-limited Analytics Query Service API caller

wx_mediawiki_api()

Generate a rate-limited MediaWiki API caller

Contents

Developed by Mikhail Popov.
